item.title: Word Game #3
item.description:
Third time's the charm?

Quote:

The rules of the Word Game: post one word that begins with the last letter of the previous poster's word. It must be an actual word that I can look up in a PAPER dictionary. Your words cannot be slang or computer-talk. Words must be spelled correctly!

You guys have a record to beat, but I'm not going to tell you what it is ;) Here's your first word!

Go!

TO CLARIFY:
1. You cannot continue off on your own words.
2. If you have to make comments, bold your word for the game and put your comments in parentheses or something. Don't make separate posts for any comments.
3. REAL WORDS. HOW DIFFICULT IS THIS? DON'T USE SOMEONE'S CHATSPEAK. I THINK IT'S FAIRLY CLEAR WHAT SOMEONE'S ENTRY FOR THE GAME IS.

Okay, just in case this wouldn't be clear, I'm going to bold the first word for this game:

phantasmagoria
item.author: (RiceAddikt)

item.title: Word Game #2
